description: Greece and Croatia reacted fast to coronavirus, but now it threatens their tourism industries.
title: Coronavirus: Greece and Croatia acted fast, now need to save summer
title_page: Coronavirus: Greece and Croatia acted fast, now need to save summer - BBC News
maintext: The prime minister intervened with an emotional, televised speech. "Personally, in recent days I felt the need to invoke my faith in order to draw strength and stand up to the challenges," said Mr Mitsotakis. However, he said he had to "listen to scientists". "What applies to public gatherings will also apply to churches."
